snippet: President Obama plans to urge Congress to pass a bill allowing workers to earn up to seven paid sick days a year and creating a fund to help states pay for family leave.
abstract: Pres Obama will ask Congress to enact measure allowing workers across nation to earn up to seven paid sick days annually and creating $2 billion fund to assist states in paying for family leave programs; will also order federal agencies to grant their employees up to six weeks of paid parental leave.
lead_paragraph: President Obama plans to urge Congress to pass a bill allowing workers to earn up to seven paid sick days a year and creating a fund to help states pay for family leave.

headline.main: Obama Plans to Push Paid Family and Sick Leave for Workers
headline.print_headline: Obama Plans to Push Paid Family and Sick Leave for Workers
